channel.title: HUGE Glitch
channel.description: It's only been the first day that I had my server and things are already starting to mess up. I can't eat any food at all, i'm invisible to myself and others, and whenever I try to walk I lose connection. My name changed to something weird and long and the only time I can see my original name is when I yell something. The little guys that announce that I am online say that I'm offline. My combat lvl has dropped greatly. My server has also seemed to get a little bit more laggy and my friend's moparscape keeps freezing when tries to play it. WHAT THE HECK IS WRONG!?

item.title: HUGE Glitch
item.dc:creator: @mjstar mjstar
item.description:
@mjstar wrote:

da cheat1:

It’s only been the first day that I had my server and things are already starting to mess up. I can’t eat any food at all, i’m invisible to myself and others, and whenever I try to walk I lose connection. My name changed to something weird and long and the only time I can see my original name is when I yell something. The little guys that announce that I am online say that I’m offline. My combat lvl has dropped greatly. My server has also seemed to get a little bit more laggy and my friend’s moparscape keeps freezing when tries to play it. WHAT THE HECK IS WRONG!?

Did you accidently do ::hide because what that does is hides your character and makes them invisible and changes your name to random letters. if so do ::show

Read full topic

item.title: HUGE Glitch
item.dc:creator: @da_cheat1 da cheat1
item.description:
@da_cheat1 wrote:

Would making a new acc help?

item.title: HUGE Glitch
item.dc:creator: @sic_pure sic pure
item.description:
@sic_pure wrote:

I don’t know then, I’d just get a new source (DrinkAlchohol Pkz is a good starting one).

Read full topic

item.title: HUGE Glitch
item.dc:creator: @da_cheat1 da cheat1
item.description:
@da_cheat1 wrote:

Well, I kinda feel as though it is my error due to the fact that these weird things didnt start happening until after I put a bit of new coding for commands and items. I’ve cleared all of that coding, but the only improvement I found is that whenever I try to walk somewhere it doesn’t log me out.

Read full topic

item.title: HUGE Glitch
item.dc:creator: @sic_pure sic pure
item.description:
@sic_pure wrote:

Take out anything you recently coded, and if you are getting acceptions in your runserver.bat then that will cause you to freeze.
